short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture your bookmark with screenshot. Quick search your bookmark, auto-tag and much more..

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Hero will capture your bookmarks with screenshots, shows the recent on top.  On click, it opens a panel where your bookmarks are populated in a Pinterest-style layout, allowing you to instantly search, edit, and manage your bookmarks.

Key Features:
1. Capture your bookmarks with screenshot.
2. Add screenshot to your existing bookmarks.
3. Instant search and quick filtering by organized folders.
4. Keep all data offline without needing internet access.
5. Edit bookmarks and reorganize them more intuitively.
6. Auto dark mode based on system settings
7. Show the last bookmark on top.
8. Display folders as tags for a true Pinterest experience.

What to Expect in Upcoming Releases:
1. Capture missing thumbnails in batches.
2. Identify non-working links.
3. Identify duplicate links.
4. Share bookmarks in a folder via email and more.
